text.p: Many thanks to Kanjana Namvech for the many conceptual illustrations, block diagrams, and importantly, drawings of cats that appear throughout the book, and to Jay Ludden for the multitude of technical diagrams without which large swathes of this text would not make the slighest amount of sense.

The assistance of several people has been invaluable in getting this project to its current state. The authors would particularly like to thank:
Zach York for a detailed review of an early draft and several long and helpful discussions about the direction of the project as a whole.
Aaron Levin, Abhinava Mehra, Alex Coad, Kristina Fischer, and Matthew Henricks for extensive feedback on and suggestions for a late draft of the text which greatly improved the style, pedagogy, and organization of this text.

Additional thanks for various discussions, exploratory sub-projects, user-testing, suggestions, and corrections to:
Alejandro Puente
Aritra Biswas
Daniel Petranek
Daniel Wortmann
Jay Ludden
Jinsey Cox
Kanjana Namvech
Matt Doran
Ming-Yee Tsang
Peter Procek
Timur Girgin
Yashovian Bidasaria
